Unless you've been there I wouldn't pass judgment on what a wife does about their cheating husband. No one has control over another person; ie his actions are his - not hers. When he was chasing women their daughter was very young. Sometimes it's best to not make mountains out of molehills until your timing is better for all involved. There are many women who need to be taken down a peg or two when they are blatantly chasing your husband too. I was in her position for 10 years; except my husband kept his discretion away from family & friends. Out of respect for my children, I also did. The Clintons went in for counseling so they must have dealt with their personal problems. End of story!
